title: Project Scaffolding and Configuration
description:
## Parent Epic
astro-template-6iw

## Tasks (from tasks.md Section 1)
- [ ] 1.1 Initialize Astro 5.x project with pnpm create astro@latest (empty template, TypeScript strict)
- [ ] 1.2 Install and configure Tailwind CSS v4 as Vite plugin, set up global.css with @theme design tokens, @tailwindcss/typography
- [ ] 1.3 Install MDX integration (@astrojs/mdx)
- [ ] 1.4 Install sitemap integration (@astrojs/sitemap) with filter function and priority/changefreq/lastmod config
- [ ] 1.5 Install RSS helper (@astrojs/rss)
- [ ] 1.6 Configure astro.config.mjs — static output, Vite plugin for Tailwind v4, integrations, site URL

## Acceptance Criteria
- Astro 5.x project initialized with TypeScript strict mode
- Tailwind v4 working with design tokens defined
- MDX, sitemap, RSS integrations installed
- pnpm run dev starts without errors
- pnpm run build completes successfully

## Reference

title: Astro Starter Theme Implementation
description:
## Overview
Complete implementation of the astro-starter-theme as specified in openspec/changes/astro-starter-theme/

## Scope
- Project scaffolding with Astro 5.x, Tailwind v4, MDX
- Developer tooling (ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, GitHub Actions)
- Site configuration system
- Layouts and navigation
- SEO infrastructure (meta tags, JSON-LD, sitemap)
- Marketing homepage with section components
- Blog system with tags, categories, pagination
- Team pages
- Service pages
- Location pages
- Demo content

- Proposal: openspec/changes/astro-starter-theme/proposal.md
- Design: openspec/changes/astro-starter-theme/design.md
- Tasks: openspec/changes/astro-starter-theme/tasks.md
- Specs: openspec/changes/astro-starter-theme/specs/

## Acceptance Criteria
- Full site builds successfully
- Lighthouse scores 90+ on all metrics
- All lint and type checks pass
